subquestions.text: Sarah usually ____ at around 6 in the morning (gets up**/goes home/brushes teeth)
She ____ in bed for a few minutes (stretches**/runs/eats)
She takes a ____ before getting dressed (shower**/nap/breakfast)
She usually has a bowl of ____ with fruit.
She often reads the ____ on her phone during breakfast.
After dinner, she might ____ or watch TV. (read a book**/ride a bike/do laundry)
Sometimes her friend ____ and they watch a movie. (comes over**/texts/calls)
